metadata.title: Add OpenClaw AI Assistant
metadata.description: Adds OpenClaw - a personal AI assistant platform running on own devices, supporting multiple messaging channels (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, etc.). Deployed as a compose stack from the official repository.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add OpenClaw personal AI assistant as a compose stack

template.title: OpenClaw
template.name: openclaw
template.description: Personal AI assistant platform running on your own hardware. Connects to multiple messaging channels (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Mattermost and more) and acts as a self-hosted AI gateway. Built on Node.js 22 with a local-first, privacy-focused architecture.

env.name: OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN
env.label: Gateway Token
env.description: Authentication token for the OpenClaw gateway WebSocket endpoint (required).

env.name: OPENCLAW_CONFIG_DIR
env.label: Config Directory
env.description: Host path for persistent configuration, sessions and workspace data.

env.name: OPENCLAW_WORKSPACE_DIR
env.label: Workspace Directory
env.description: Host path for agent files and skills.

env.name: CLAUDE_AI_SESSION_KEY
env.label: Claude AI Session Key
env.description: Session key for Claude AI provider (optional).

env.name: OPENCLAW_INSTALL_BROWSER
env.label: Install Browser
env.description: Set to 'true' to enable Chromium browser automation support.

template.note: Before starting, copy .env.example to .env and set at least OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN. The gateway binds to 127.0.0.1:18789 by default â€” adjust the compose file to expose it on the network if needed. Full documentation: github.com/openclaw/openclaw
